net.kuujo.copycat.util.concurrent

Class ComposableFuture<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>
      • net.kuujo.copycat.util.concurrent.ComposableFuture<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompletionStage<T>, Future<T>, BiConsumer<T,Throwable>

    public class ComposableFuture<T>
extends CompletableFuture<T>
implements BiConsumer<T,Throwable>
    Special implementation of CompletableFuture with missing utility methods.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
